note.p: Undated fragment, but see M to N. Holtze, 9 September 1891.

cell.p: So far as I can judge without seeing fruit.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.p: The few plants from this collection, not yet named, will be carefully dissected for accurate examination I shall soon write again.
